bs-articleinfo-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of article info extension
prefs-articleinfo:
Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], headline for article information section in preferences.
{{Identical|Page information}}
bs-articleinfo-pref-CheckRevisionInterva: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], timespan until article informations are updated in seconds:
bs-articleinfo-nav-link-title: Label of the side menu entry
bs-articleinfo-flyout-categorylinks-titl:
Title of the panel showing page categories
{{Identical|Category}}
bs-articleinfo-flyout-templatelinks-titl: Title of the panel showing templates used on the page
bs-articleinfo-flyout-categorylinks-empt: Text displayed if there are no categories assigned to the page
bs-articleinfo-flyout-templatelinks-empt: Text displayed if there are no templates used on the page
bs-articleinfo-flyout-lasteditedtime-tex: Label of the panel section showing the last time the article was edited
bs-articleinfo-flyout-lastediteduser-tex: Label of the panel section showing the last editor
bs-articleinfo-newrevision-info-text: Message within an alert box, presented to the user when a new page revision is available
bs-articleinfo-flyout-subpages-title: Title of the panel showing subpages of the page
bs-articleinfo-pagetool-subpages-tooltip: Tool tip for an icon above the page title. Shows a list tree of subpages
bs-articleinfo-dialog-subpages-title: Title of a dialog window that shows a list of subpages
